text: Lynn Wayne Rogers (born September 11, 1958) is an American politician and businessman. In 2021, he became Treasurer of Kansas. He was the 51st Lieutenant Governor of Kansas from 2019 to 2021. He is a Democrat. He was on the Board of Wichita Public Schools from 2001 to 2017. He was also in the Kansas Senate representing the 25th District of west Wichita from 2017 to 2019. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Educators from Nebraska Category:Lieutenant Governors of Kansas Category:Businesspeople from Kansas Category:Businesspeople from Nebraska Category:Politicians from Nebraska Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Educators from Kansas
title: Lynn Rogers (politician)
